title: Can you correct the mistakes in my writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s actually an easier way to check all of your mistakes and edit the paper: you can use one of the tools that will automatically check your writing and highlight the mistakes. Of course, plenty of them are paid and if you really need one for permanent usage I’d recommend you to buy one. However, if you only occasionally need to check some text you can use a tool like this one: Correct My Writing. You will instantly get the report about your: grammar;punctuation;spelling;sentence structure;style and enhancement.Just insert your text into the tool:  And hopefully, this will help you!

To what mistakes are you referring - it is difficult to answer an open-ended question. If your mistakes are grammar and spelling the average word processor can take care of major problems. You can install Grammarly which also works on comments in web pages. If you have problems with your story and its context then that would be an entirely different issue.
If it’s short, sure. Otherwise, you can give me a sample of your work. If I think it’s manageable, you can hire me to edit your work. Or you can hire someone else, or have Grammarly help you.

I do this for a living. People pay me good money to correct their work, polish it and make it perfect. If you publish a small sample of your work on Quora, I will correct it for you free of charge so that you can get a feel for how big the gap may be between what you want to say and how you are saying it. After that, you’re on your own, I’m afraid…

Totally would, but I don’t have access (and assume no one else does either). With google docs, to share it with anyone, you should first of all make sure the link you are putting out on the internet is a copy of your original doc—never trust strangers with your original copy. Second, to get a link open to everyone, click the blue “share” button on the top right of your doc. Then be sure to change the change the link sharing options so that anyone with the link can edit/suggest/comment (whatever you want), and copy that link. That’s the one you should paste here!
Use Grammarly software…. enjoy the magic…

I will do that if I'm in the mood to do so, or if asked. I rather not work on other people's writings; I am busy writing myself, too. Also, I don't really enjoy it. I will correct the mistakes in someone else's writing here on Quora if I happened to be with a good friend who's a native English speaker (that is, if (s)he agrees to do so, too).
